content: this hat is a stash-buster designed to match my purl soho mistake rib scarf i knit several years ago yarn 150 no brim - 200 3 brim yards of sport-weight yarn shown in purl soho mulberry merino in black green needles us size 6 circular and dpns gauge 23st per 4 in in mistake rib pattern size adult - the mistake rib pattern is pretty stretchy so this will fit most adults
